title: Edging, 19th century
creditline: Gift of Mrs. William P. Treadwell
description: Two pieces of black cotton lace edging formed by sewing two narrow strips together. Chantilly-style conventionalized floral pattern.

tombstone.epitaph:
Edging, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: machine made. Gift of Mrs. William P. Treadwell. 1916-33-4-a,b.
